rooms.name: Entrance Hall and Living Area
rooms.description: A Scandinavian-inspired open space combining a spacious entrance hall with an adjoining living area. The design includes minimalistic furnishings, natural light, and functional storage. Built-in furniture and neutral color palettes complement the farmhouse aesthetic.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: A modern Scandinavian kitchen with clean lines and efficient workflow. Features include an island for casual dining and workspace, ample storage, energy-efficient appliances, and a connection to the living area.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: An elegant dining space with minimalist Scandinavian decor. Features include a dining table for family gatherings and natural lighting.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious master bedroom designed with Scandinavian simplicity, incorporating ample storage, a dressing area, and a private balcony. The room is oriented in accordance with Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A comfortable guest bedroom featuring Scandinavian design elements such as clean lines and functional furniture. The room is well-lit with natural light.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A full ensuite bathroom integrated into the master bedroom space with minimalist design, functional fixtures and Scandinavian style tiles.

rooms.name: Utility Room
rooms.description: A utility area for laundry, storage, and maintenance. Designed with efficient layout following Scandinavian principles.

openings.description: Large double doors at the entrance to allow ample natural light and facilitate smooth flow between indoor and outdoor spaces.
Floor-to-ceiling windows placed along the living area walls for maximum natural light while maintaining privacy. Vastu principles are adhered to in orientation.
Large windows in the master bedroom for natural ventilation and adherence to Vastu principles.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom (Upper)
rooms.description: An additional master bedroom on the first floor with a private balcony overlooking the swimming pool area. Scandinavian design is maintained with subtle color accents and functional space planning.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom (Upper)
rooms.description: A guest bedroom complementing the master bedroom on the first floor. Features Scandinavian minimalism and efficient space utilization.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: A dedicated study or home office area with ample natural light. Designed for productivity while maintaining a calm and minimal aesthetic.

rooms.name: Balcony/ Terrace
rooms.description: A well-designed balcony or terrace integrated into the upper level, offering an outdoor space for relaxation and enjoying the view of the swimming pool.

openings.description: Large windows on the upper level to ensure natural light and ventilation in accordance with Vastu principles.
A well-designed staircase connecting ground and first floors ensuring smooth transition between levels. Features wooden handrails with minimalist design.

rooms.name: Outdoor Deck/ Pool Deck
rooms.description: A spacious roof deck serving as an extension of the outdoor living space with direct access to the swimming pool. Incorporates Scandinavian design elements such as clean lines and functional outdoor furniture.

openings.description: A door from the first floor leading to the roof deck for easy access to the outdoor space and swimming pool area.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool Area
rooms.description: An outdoor swimming pool area designed with Scandinavian aesthetics, featuring a minimalist design and efficient water circulation. The pool is positioned at the corner plot to enhance privacy and views.

rooms.name: Storage
rooms.description: A storage space integrated into the basement area for garden tools, sports equipment, and seasonal items. Designed with functionality and Scandinavian simplicity.

openings.description: A covered entrance from the roof deck to the basement, ensuring protection of access in adverse weather.
